alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens; Telfair; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:09AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, east central Dodge, north central Telfair and northwestern Wheeler Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1209 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Cedar Grove, or near Alamo, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Alamo, Helena, Scotland, Achord, Cedar Grove and Little Ocmulgee State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
